revision.comment: Omega moved page [[GlobalScale MiraBox]] to [[GlobalScale MiraBox V5]]: fixed ;
revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=GlobalScale |model=MiraBox |revision=V5-0-1 |serialnum_prefix=MBX-1345 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=Yes |type=single-board computer |fcc_id=YCJ003-MBX001 |fcc_date=03/21/2013 |flags=Bluetooth 4.0, Micro SD Card slot, GPIO, |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=3 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.1 |pwr_barrel_len=9.5 |cpu1_brand=Marvell |cpu1_model=88F6707;ARMADA 370; |cpu1_cspeed=1.2 GHz |cpu1_cores=1 |fla1=1 GiB |fla1_brand=Micron |fla1_model=29F8G08ABABA |ram1=1 GiB |ram1_brand=Elpida |ram1_model=J2108BCSE-DJ-F |ram1_num=4 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, USB 3.0, Mini PCle |expansion_minipcie_num=1 |expansion_usb_num=4 |jtag=yes,, 8-pin header,, populated,, J23 |serial=yes,, USB Female Mini-B,, (115200 8N1) |wi1_module=GlobalScale GTI WIFI II |wi1_module_if=Mini PCIe (USB) |wi1_chip1_brand=Marvell |wi1_chip1_model=88W8766 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Marvell |eth_chip2_model=88E1510 |eth_chip3_brand=Marvell |eth_chip3_model=88E1510 |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=1 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=1 |802dot11_protocols=bgn |addl_chips=2K 2-Wire Serial EEPROM;Atmel;24C02N;;1;,,, USB 3.0 / xHCI Host Controller;Fresco Logic;FL1009;;1;,,, USB 2.0 High Speed 4-Port Hub Controller;JFD;FE1.1s;;1,,, USB 2.0 SD/MMC/MS Flash Card Reader;Genesys Logic;GL827L;;2;,,, USB to Serial Bridge Controller;Prolific Technology;PL-2303HX;;1;,,, 2A Linear Power, Low Dropout Regulator;uPI Semiconductor;uP0105;;1;,,, 2A Linear Power, Low Dropout Regulator;uPI Semiconductor;uP0109;;1;,,, 2A, 1.5MHz Synchronous Step-Down Regulator;Feeling Technology;FP6163;;5;,,, Single N-Channel, Logic Level, PowerTrench MOSFET;Fairchild Semiconductor;FDS6680A;;1; |stock_boot=U-Boot;2009.08;Marvell v1.1.2 NQ; |stock_os=Linux;2.6.35.9;Debian 7; |default_ssid=mira-uAP-XXXX |default_ip=acquired via DHCP |default_user=root |default_pass=nosoup4u |oui=00:90:A2, 00:11:7F |oui_eth=F0:AD:4E }}
*[http://www.globalscaletechnologies.com/p-58-mirabox-development-kit.aspx Product page for the MiraBox dev kit] :[http://www.em.avnet.com/en-us/design/drc/Pages/Marvell-Development-Kits-from-GlobalScale.aspx Marvell Development Kits from GlobalScale]
"GLOBALSCALE" and "Mira_Box_II_V5-0-1" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :2x available USB 2.0 ports are via internal headers only.
*Armada 370 Series [http://www.marvell.com/guide/assets/data/marvell_psg.pdf DS] ARM v7 (Single Core) :88F6W11 @800MHz/1.0/1.2GHz :88F6707 @800MHz/1.0/1.2GHz :88F6710 @1.2GHz
